ComicInfo.Series: The Stuff of Legend: A Call to Arms
ComicInfo.Summary:
The fifth volume of the New York Times-bestselling series continues here! As our heroes search for a way to defeat The Boogeyman, the dark one rebuilds his own army, preparing for what he believes will be the war to end all wars. While The Toymaker toils away on what could be the deadliest weapon of The Boogeyman's arsenal, a dark secret is revealed. One that could change your perception of The Dark forever!
